title: State v. Pamela Lanier – Episode 2 – An Offer She Can't Refuse
content:encoded:
April 30, 2018 / After Dorian dies, Pam Lanier is harassed and offered a series of enticing plea bargains.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon. Additional scoring music by Kai Engel and Nctrnm.

This episode was sponsored by ProFlowers.
